entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's doppelgangers. He examines his reflection in the kettle.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is another one of Harry's doppelgangers. She checks herself in the microwave door.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is likely a reference to Bill Weasley, but it could also be another name for one of Harry's doppelgangers.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is one of Harry's doppelgangers. He indicates the first sack and explains how to find clothes and glasses.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the real boy who has six doppelgangers. He watches as they rummage through the sacks.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is likely a reference to Ginny Weasley, but it could also be another name for one of Harry's doppelgangers or someone else in the story.

relationships.description: Fred examines his reflection in the kettle.
Fleur checks herself in the microwave door.
Moody indicates the first sack and explains how to find clothes and glasses.
Harry watches as his six doppelgangers rummage through the sacks.
